Class Summonable

  • java.lang.Object
    • Summonable

  • abstract class Summonable
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract Class Summonable. A Summonable class consists of Point type position, integer type direction and speed, and double type constant PI. A Summonable class will represent all objects that can be summoned in the Aquarium.
    Version:
    21 April 2018
    Author:
    Rabbi Fijar Mayoza --13516081
